dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT v.process_control_request_id job_id, v.parameter_id, TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(v.next_process_time AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY HH:MI PM') next_process_time, TRIM(v.report_name) report_name, TO_CHAR((v.cycle_duration / 60 / 60 / 24), '99') || ' day(s)' cycle_duration FROM process_control_request pr CROSS JOIN (SELECT pr1.process_control_request_id, pr1.next_process_time, pr1.cycle_duration, (CASE WHEN INSTR(topic_parameters,'CARRIER_ID=') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'CARRIER_ID=')+11,25),0,INSTR(SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'CARRIER_ID=')+11,25),'&')-1) WHEN INSTR(topic_parameters,'WAREHOUSE_GID=') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'WAREHOUSE_GID=')+14,25),0,INSTR(SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'WAREHOUSE_GID=')+14,25),'&')-1) WHEN INSTR(topic_parameters,'CUSTOMER_ID=') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'CUSTOMER_ID=')+12,LENGTH(topic_parameters)),0,INSTR(SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'CUSTOMER_ID=')+12,LENGTH(topic_parameters)),'&')-1) ELSE 'NO ID PARAMETER FOR THIS REPORT' END) parameter_id, SUBSTR(topic_parameters,27,INSTR(topic_parameters,'-queryString')-28) report_name FROM process_control_request pr1 WHERE NOT pr1.next_process_time IS NULL AND TRIM(SUBSTR(SUBSTR(pr1.topic_parameters,27,INSTR(pr1.topic_parameters,'-queryString')-28),1,13)) = 'SCOULAR/FOOD') v WHERE pr.process_control_request_id = v.process_control_request_id AND NOT v.process_control_request_id IN (630,631,8092) AND NOT v.report_name IS NULL AND TRIM(SUBSTR(SUBSTR(pr.topic_parameters,27,INSTR(pr.topic_parameters,'-queryString')-28),1,13)) = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' ORDER BY v.process_control_request_id
